hero.title: Find Your Perfect Workspace
hero.subtitle: Rent desk space by the hour in homes, ateliers, coffee shops and offices near you. Work where inspiration strikes.

flexible.title: Flexible Booking
flexible.description: Book by the hour, day, or week. No long-term commitments.

verified.title: Verified Spaces
verified.description: All workspaces are verified for quality and amenities.

instant.title: Instant Access
instant.description: Get immediate access to your workspace after booking.

success.title: Thank you!
success.message: You've been added to our waitlist. We'll be in touch soon!

error.title: Oops!
error.message: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
